name: Doom
title: Lucifer
lore: He who was once the morning star, Lucifer, fell from grace and became the lord of all demons, Doom.

devour.name: Devour
devour.description: Consumes a creep, gaining bonus gold and the creep's abilities.

scorchedEarth.name: Scorched Earth
scorchedEarth.description: Doom engulfs himself in flames, damaging nearby enemies and gaining bonus movement speed and regen.

infernalBlade.name: Infernal Blade
infernalBlade.description: Doom's attacks deal bonus damage based on the enemy's max HP and stun briefly.

doom_ability.name: Doom
doom_ability.description: Inflicts Doom on the target, dealing massive damage over time and muting all items and abilities.
